author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...BERYL NEARING THE MIDDLE TEXAS COAST... ...200 AM CDT POSITION UPDATE...
summary:
...BERYL NEARING THE MIDDLE TEXAS COAST... ...200 AM CDT POSITION UPDATE...
 As of 2:00 AM CDT Mon Jul 8
 the center of Beryl was located near 28.3, -95.9
 with movement NNW at 10 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 982 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.
